token_info.name: TRANSFORMATION
token_info.description: Created by @MathMakesArt (https://mathmakes.art) on 2021/04/01. 1024 colored squares shift from one highly-symmetric pattern to the next, intermittently reaching states of great disorder. Generative geometric pattern animation using the phrase "TRANSFORMATION" as input. Approximately 50 seconds in length. String-to-pixelart encoding scheme first displayed in my "25 Hashes" piece (https://www.hicetnunc.xyz/objkt/9953) and many others.
